description: PHOTO: Pope Francis waves to the crowd from the window of the apostolic palace overlooking St Peter's square during the Sunday Angelus prayer, Aug. 13, 2017.
maintext:
YOU JUST SAW:
PHOTO: Pope Francis waves to the crowd from the window of the apostolic palace overlooking St Peter's square during the Sunday Angelus prayer, Aug. 13, 2017.
title: PHOTO: Pope Francis waves to the crowd from the window of the apostolic palace overlooking St Peter's square during the Sunday Angelus prayer, Aug. 13, 2017.
